com.mishmash.alpha
Class VehicleFactory

java.lang.Object
  com.mishmash.alpha.VehicleFactory

public class VehicleFactory
extends java.lang.Object

Factory class that handles creation of Vehicles and Vehicle parts. Implements the singleton pattern in a thread-safe, lazy implementation way.

getPartNamesForType

public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getPartNamesForType(VehicleType type,
                                                            VehicleGuiPart guiPart)
Externally accessible function that gets the names of parts available for the given vehicle type and vehicle part.

Parameters:
type - The type of vehicle
guiPart - The part of the vehicle we're getting parts for.
Returns:
A list of names of parts eligible to be installed.

createVehicleWithData

public Vehicle createVehicleWithData(VehicleType type,
                                     java.util.Map<VehicleGuiPart,java.lang.String> userData)
Externally accessible Vehicle creator.

Parameters:
type - The type of vehicle.
userData - The parts with which to make the vehicle.
Returns:
A new vehicle created with the given parts, or null if not all parts were found/valid.
